Texts.Chs: 这本颇具启发性的杂志似乎包含了各种脱衣状态下的人类参与的几乎所有可以想象的交配仪式。 还有一些甚至不完全可以想象。 看起来 (至少在地球的尽头之前) 人类记录他们的交配行为。 然后把它卖给其他人。 这可真奇怪。
Texts.Eng: This rather...revealing publication appears to contain humans in various states of undress engaging in mating rituals of just about every imaginable sort. And some that are not all that imaginable. It would seem (at least before the end of Earth) that Humans document their mating acts. And sell it to other humans. Strange.
